resources.string: SRISHTI INNOVATIVE COMPUTER SYSTEMS (P) LTD. 2nd Floor, Mathews Arcade, Opp. Chaithanya Eye Hospital, Kesavadasapuram, Thiruvananthapuram-4.

•The Entrance Examination will be objective type with Multiple Choice Questions and based on single response.
•For each question, four suggested answers would be given, of which only one will be the MOST APPROPRIATE RESPONSE.
•The candidate will have to select and mark the option corresponding to the most appropriate response
•This Exam will have 75 questions to be answered in 75 minutes
•For each correct response in the Entrance Examination, the candidates will be awarded FOUR marks, and for each incorrect response, ONE mark will be deducted from the total score All the best!!!!
